Hello, 


I found 
       


  if (!generalization_test) {
    state[0] = state[1] = state[3] = state[4] = state[5] = 0;
    state[2] = 0.07; // one_degree;
  }
  else {
    state[4] = state[5] = 0;
  }


at void CartPole::init(bool randomize) in experiment.cpp randomize).

I think that one_degree is 0.0174532.


Is it true??



Shino
